query.name: find-all-dcs
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-name'/> = ${dc-name} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id' /> = ${dc-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-master-by-dc-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id' /> = ${dc-id} AND <FIELD name='metaserver-role' /> = 'master' AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-clusters
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-cluster-by-cluster-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-name'/> = ${cluster-name} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-cluster
find-all-by-metaserver-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='metaserver-id' /> = ${metaserver-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-id' /> = ${cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id' /> = ${dc-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-id' /> = ${cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-shard-by-shard-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='shard-name' /> = ${shard-name} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-cluster-shard
find-all-by-dc-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-id' /> = ${dc-cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-shard-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='shard-id' /> = ${shard-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-setinel-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='setinel-id' /> = ${setinel-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-cluster-shard-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-shard-id' /> = ${dc-cluster-shard-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-keeper-by-keepercontainer-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='keepercontainer-id' /> = ${keepercontainer-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='keepercontainer-dc' /> = ${keepercontainer-dc} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id' /> = ${dc-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0
